title: Lemon Slice, which launched a 20B-parameter model that creates digital avatars for AI agents, streaming video at 20 FPS on a single GPU, raised a $10.5M seed (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
summary: Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch: Lemon Slice, which launched a 20B-parameter model that creates digital avatars for AI agents, streaming video at 20 FPS on a single GPU, raised a $10.5M seed â€” Developers and companies are increasingly deploying AI agents and chatbots within their apps, but so far they've mostly been restricted to text.
